Attributes.description: Written and oral communication in chemical and biological engineering: business correspondence, laboratory reports, technical description, and poster presentations. Restricted to students in second year of the Chemical and Biological Engineering programs.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: One of APSC 176, ENGL 110, ENGL 111, ENGL 112, ENGL 120, ENGL 121, WRDS 150.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 1, Days: Tue, Start Time: 12:30, End Time: 14:00, Building: MacLeod, Room: 3002
